ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: each self will know what it has sent ahead and left behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Each soul will know what it had sent ahead and what it had left behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: everyone shall know all his deeds, both the earlier and the later.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: every soul will see the result of its deeds - those recorded before his death and those which will produce either virtue or evil after his death.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Every soul will come to know what it has sent ahead and what it left behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A person will know what he has sent forward and left behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Every soul shall know what it has sent before and held back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then a soul shall know its works, the former and the latter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A soul will know what it hath sent before (it) and what left behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then everyone will know what he has sent ahead, and what he has left behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Each soul shall know that which it sent afore and that which it left behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then a soul shall know what it has sent ahead and left behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Then) shall each soul know what it hath sent forward and (what it hath) kept back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Then) a person will know what he has sent forward and (what he has) left behind (of good or bad deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: the soul shall know what it has done, the former and the latter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Each soul will know what it has advanced, and what it has deferred.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:5] a soul, every soul, will know, at the time of the [occurrence of the] things mentioned, which is the Day of Resurrection, what it has sent ahead, in the way of deeds, and, what [it has], left behind, of these and did not do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A soul) every soul at that point (will know what it hath sent before (it)) of good or evil (and what left behind) of good or evil wont; it is also said this means: it will know the acts of obedience it offered and those it missed.
